Parameter Value[Post Extraction]: Solvent used for Extraction, i.e. 'MeOH', or 'MeOH/H2O (70:30, v:v)', etc.
Parameter Value[Chromatography Instrumen: Model of LC instrument used, i.e. 'Agilent 1290 Infinity LC'.
Parameter Value[Autosampler model]: Model of Autosampler used, i.e. 'Waters ACQUITY I-Class Sample Manager'.
Parameter Value[Column model]: Model of Column used, i.e. 'Kinetex EVO C18 (2.6 µm, 2.1 mm x 50 mm; Phenomenex)'.
Parameter Value[Guard column]: Model of Guard Column if available, i.e. 'ACQUITY UPLC BEH C18 VanGuard Pre-column (1.7 µm, 2.1 mm x 5 mm; Waters)'.
Labeled Extract Name: Name of chemical or biochemical marker used for Labelling, if used.
Parameter Value[Scan m/z range]: Range used in the assay, i.e: 100-1000.
Parameter Value[Instrument]: Model of MS instrument used, i.e. 'Bruker micrOTOF-Q II'.
Parameter Value[Ion source]: i.e. 'electrospray ionization', 'nanoelectrospray', 'atmospheric pressure chemical ionization, etc.
Parameter Value[Mass analyzer]: i.e. 'triple quadrupole', 'quadrupole', 'quadrupole time-of-flight', 'time-of-flight', 'quadrupole ion trap', 'hybrid triple quadrupole-linear ion trap', etc.
Raw Spectral Data File:
i.e. 'FILES/myfilename.raw' or 'FILES/myfilename.d', etc.
OR if in folder structure
'FILES/RAW_FILES/POS/myfilename.raw' or 'FILES/RAW_FILES/POS/myfilename.d', etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                      If FILES are '.wiff' and '.wiff.scan' are present, 2 'Raw Spectral Data File' columns are needed
Normalization Name: Normalization data files, preferably as an Excel file, if available
Derived Spectral Data File:
i.e. 'FILES/myfilename.mzML' or 'FILES/myfilename.mzXML', etc.
OR if in folder structure
'FILES/RAW_FILES/POS/myfilename.mzML' or 'FILES/RAW_FILES/POS/myfilename.mzXML', etc.
